body:
sponeta @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=3735#pr132809 reported

AI cast Farbog Boneflinger, then chose one of its own creatures (Bane Alley Blackguard) to get -2/-2, even though I had two creatures too, one of which (Will-o'-the-Wisp) would have been killed if the AI had targeted that. There were no effects preventing the AI from targeting my creatures.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Poor play with Farbog Boneflinger
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on September 26, 2013 10:06:27_

sponeta @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=3735#pr132809 reported

AI cast Farbog Boneflinger, then chose one of its own creatures (Bane Alley Blackguard) to get -2/-2, even though I had two creatures too, one of which (Will-o'-the-Wisp) would have been killed if the AI had targeted that. There were no effects preventing the AI from targeting my creatures.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=406_
